comments.body: I searched through the code base to find all the spots where we set the segment interval to 1 minute just because it was the min. I've set them all lower (typically to 100ms, because it's a nice round number) mostly to avoid implying that there's anything special about 60s anymore.

In all the places where the test logic actually depends on the segment interval, I've expanded the expressions to include it. Theoretically, we should be able to plug in any number for the segment interval, and the tests should still pass.
